name: Null-Sec Scr!pts
body:
## Welcome to Null-Sec's GitHub Page.

This is a pages for all of Null-Sec's projects and Scripts. 



### Installing
Open terminal and make sub-directory for your git clones
```
mkdir NSTools
cd NSTools
git clone https://github.com/Null-Sec/NSTools.git
```
     
     
     
### Running Scr!pts
Open terminal and go to the scr!pts directory
```
cd NSTools/Scr!pts/
./{Scr!pt}
```
Example;
```
./WPA-BF.py 
```
     
     
     
### Tools
* Null-Crypter (For Metasploit-Framework)
     
     
     
### Scr!pts
* SSH Exploitation
* WIDS 
* WPA-BF 
     
     
     
### Authors and Contributors
Null-Sec and The Null-Sec community http://www.null-sec.ru 
     
     
     
### Support or Contact
Duggan@Null-Sec.ru
